desc: First debuting in Germany in 2008, napcabs disruptive model of automated hospitality offers a self-contained soundproofed private space loaded with amenities including a bed, desk, television, and WiFi among others. Our central value proposition with napcabs & Napcity is meeting the universal need for short-term space.

layout.text: Our napcabs can be utilized in space efficient clusters to reimagine a wide variety of spaces.
